name: Mr. Scientist
description:
You were driving to your dacha when suddenly a tree falls! You wake up and find out that you are now a hostage to a mad scientist who wants to conduct experiments on you.





Now your main task is to escape from this house, but there is a problem! The main door is locked with several types of locks! You have to search this big house and find everything that will help you escape. But you need to be very careful, because an evil scientist is walking around the house, if he sees or hears you, he will again catch you. His patience is not infinite, so you are given a couple of days to escape.





If he catches you several times in a row, then you will be locked in this house until the end of your days.
